channel.title: Team Forestry on Forestry.io
channel.description: Recent content in Team Forestry on Forestry.io

item.title: 2018/05/28 Changelog
item.description: Features Cloudinary Support Data-file templates Data files can now use templates in the same way that pages can. Color-picker front-matter field added Text strikethrough ability added to editor OAuth login added to remote admin Enhancements Updated Groups, Group-list, and Blocks UI Configurable media paths Date fields can be displayed in UTC instead of local timezone Group-list “Add” button applies smart labels to pluralized group names (E.
